DOC.brief_summary: This prospective observational study will assess the regional cerebral oxygen saturation and cardiac output non-invasively in patients with subarachnoid hemorrhage during nimodipine administration for the prevention/management of cerebral vasospasm.
DOC.brief_title: Noninvasive Assessment of Cerebral Oxygenation and Cardiac Function in Patients With Neurovascular Diseases
DOC.criteria: aneurysmal subarachnoid hemorrhage potential or actual cerebral vasospasm nonaneurysmal subarachnoid hemorrhage outside the 421 day window after ictus peripheral deoxygenation contraindication for nimodipine administration
